message.body: Marth! They changed my schedule at work so I don't even HAVE a lunch break tomorrow since I start at 11 :( what should we do?
Oh man, bummer. I'll see what I can think of... :(
Hey, can you put the stuff I left in your car under my car or something?
Under your car?! I mean I could! I just don't want anything to happen to it.
Well it's just clothes and a jacket, I think it'll be ok for a little while?
I dont think I'm going to be back in the cities :(
Aw ok! Well sure. I,m so excited for you and pig iron :)
Thanks sugar. I'll be in touch, and I'll leave your book aomewhere?
Oh sure. In the little chest by our door. That's where I'll put your stuff!
Maybe you'll get to pick me up after all! My plane had bad breaks so they're rebooking everything. I think I'll be in at 3 now
Oh! Well if you don't mind waiting. I'm done with work at 630!
Oh man, that long huh? Well nevermind... I'll try finding something :)
